Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Chapter 1001'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=40>Chapter 1001</size></color>', 4: '50'}
{1: '2', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>— A Summer of Cicadas and Rising Winds —</size></color>', 4: '-50'}
{3: 'A Summer of Cicadas and Rising Winds'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieShizhong02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieShizhong02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory609.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Noisy cicada songs fill your ears as physical senses gradually return to your body. You try to open your eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "Commandant, can you tell what number I'm making?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The gray-haired girl waves her hands in front of you, making shapes that look like a gun and a circle. Sunlight filters through the gaps between her fingers and dances gently across my face.'}
{3: "Maybe it's the deafening cicada songs, or perhaps the blinding sunlight, but you can't shake this feeling that you've forgotten something..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Wrong! It's 70! Looks like you're not fully awake yet, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Maybe it's the deafening cicada songs, or perhaps the blinding sunlight, but you can't shake this feeling that you've forgotten something..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Wrong! It's 70! Looks like you're not fully awake yet, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Maybe it's the deafening cicada songs, or perhaps the blinding sunlight, but you can't shake this feeling that you've forgotten something..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Bingo! It's 70! Looks like you're wide awake now, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though everything else remains blank, you somehow remember that the girl before you is called Nanami.'}
{3: 'You try to move your body, and a slight stinging sensation runs across your back—summer is when the grass grows most abundantly and when its blades are at their prickliest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's the apocalypse now, the apocalypse!", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's not something to be happy about!", 3: '43', 4: '...', 5: '43'}
{3: 'The scene before you triggers an inexplicable sense of déjà vu, yet something feels subtly different.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory566.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Somewhere far, far away, or perhaps in some far, far distant past, someone had uttered these same words to you...'}
{3: "Except you can't quite seem to recall how it all happened."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory609.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront30.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab'}
{3: 'This place teems with birdsong and fragrant flowers, brimming with vitality—even the sunlight itself seems alive.'}
{3: 'If this is what they call the "apocalypse," it\'s certainly a lot livelier now than the barren wasteland you\'d expect.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Now, Commandant, come on a treasure hunt with Nanami!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What treasure?', 3: '66', 4: "...What exactly is this treasure you're talking about?", 5: '66'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The Cardman Rider's Cosmic Belt!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Anyway, let's head out together, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{3: 'You enter the city streets with Nanami. The magnificent buildings stand like crystals, with light bouncing between their staggered forms, painting a dazzling, luxurious panorama.'}
{3: 'The cicadas sing endlessly. Yet the city offers nothing but a hollow silence.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Heeey! Anyooone theeeere?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Such questions usually go unanswered in these "apocalyptic" streets, but...'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: "Cosmic Rider v1.0 Arcade Edition is now live! Control your Cosmic Rider as you voyage through space in search of civilization's salvation."}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: "Players who complete the game have a chance to win a Cosmic Rider's Belt! Don't miss out!"}
{1: '1', 3: "Nanami's shout seems to have triggered some kind of voice-activated broadcast. She spins around, her eyes sparkling with excitement, ready to spring into action."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'There it is! The treasure—our mission target!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What? But I thought it was going to be super time-consuming!', 3: '90', 4: 'I will.', 5: '98'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'As you voice your skepticism, Nanami gives you a knowing smile, then grabs your hand and rushes toward the source of the electronic voice.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Without another word, Nanami grabs your hand and rushes toward the source of the electronic voice.'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'Please put on your VR simulation helmets. The game will begin shortly.'}
{2: 'Am I playing, too?', 3: '109'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I don't fully understand how this game works, but I'm sure Cosmic Rider is a two-player game!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami points at the two player portraits on the screen, then winks at you with an expectant look.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront30.png', 3: '0.2', 4: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront2.png', 3: '1', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory617.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory724.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1017.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz2804.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory835.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1010.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory782.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory709.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory825.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory334.png', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront2.png', 3: '1', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{3: 'You put on the helmet together with Nanami. The world around you changes in the blink of an eye, and you find yourself in the boundless expanse of space.'}
{3: 'This virtual reality game is designed for two players, and it offers an incredibly authentic space exploration experience. You can take in the breathtaking cosmic vistas...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wow, Nanami is drifting so far, so very far away...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Floating beside you, Nanami turns her head to look back at Earth as it grows smaller and smaller behind her.'}
{3: "Yet Cosmic Rider doesn't just recreate the beauty of space—it also perfectly simulates the darkness and weightlessness unique to the deep void..."}
{3: "Few can endure the loneliness of traversing deep space alone—perhaps that's why Cosmic Rider was designed for two players."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Thank goodness you're here with me, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl turns around with a bright smile, takes your hand, and pulls you closer to her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront30.png', 3: '0.2', 4: '5', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1106.jpg'}

{1: "<para\\>For all its talk of finding civilization's ultimate answer, the game simply has you drift through virtual space <para\\>while collecting various glowing star-like light points.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 7: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'While "Cosmic Rider" sounds like a title brimming with heroic adventure, the game itself is more of a leisurely journey.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 7: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'As you drift through the endless river of stars, you\'ll see that only a few points of starlight could truly be called "answers."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 7: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'Most of the time, you just keep wandering onward, ever onward, with no particular destination in mind.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 7: '1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'After drifting for what feels like an eternity, you suddenly realize the hand you were holding has slipped away, and darkness engulfs everything around you.'}
{3: 'Not a single ray of light remains—you are completely alone in this world.'}
{2: 'Nanami, Nanami!!', 3: '184', 4: '(Struggle desperately)', 5: '189'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: "Commandant! Nanami's here, Nanami's right here!", 3: '50', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: "Commandant! Nanami's here, Nanami's right here!"}
{3: 'The voice by your ear is barely audible, but you manage to grasp onto that single ray of light.'}
{3: 'The cosmos beats a soft, slow rhythm, drawing the lost rider into slumber.'}
{2: 'Nanami!!!', 3: '191', 4: '(Struggle with all your might)', 5: '191'}
{3: 'The space around you starts trembling violently.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg'}
{3: 'The sudden sensation of free-falling from a great height overwhelms you, forcing you to gasp for air.'}
{2: 'Ugh...', 3: '202', 4: "(Hold Nanami's hand tightly)", 5: '203'}
{3: 'Seeing you wake up, Nanami finally stops shaking you.'}
{3: 'Her hand feels warm and gentle in yours. She pauses for a moment, then smiles and returns your grip. The sensation of falling gradually fades away.'}
{2: 'I was just floating when I noticed you were gone...', 3: '208', 4: 'And then I was all alone.', 5: '208'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The panoramic simulation helmet seems to have malfunctioned. I didn't see you take off your helmet when we'd cleared the stage together, and I thought you were just having too much fun in there!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She touches your forehead with concern.'}
{3: 'The endless cicada chirping outside the window and the empty streets below echo the cosmic loneliness that quietly creeps into your heart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And this was only the prologue of "Cosmic Rider"... I wonder if those Cosmic Riders ever managed to save the world...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory609.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'In this faded world, Nanami is the only vibrant color that remains.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab'}
{3: "Unable to face the innocent look on Nanami's face, you turn your gaze toward the window instead."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Say, how did you manage to find me...', 3: '233'}
{2: 'When the helmet was malfunctioning?', 3: '234'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's super simple! All I had to do was link up with the helmet's central processor, dive into the data stream from the panoramic image generation core, and analyze the data to...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Realizing her explanation might be a bit too technical, Nanami scratches her head sheepishly.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '—And then all I had to do was find that one shining star in the universe, Commandant, and yes, that would be you!', 4: '1'}
{2: "I bet it took you a while, didn't it?", 3: '240', 4: 'Since the place was so big and all.', 5: '240'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Not really... it's only been a minute in here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While it\'s only been a minute "here", it felt much longer while she was in the data stream... But before you can ponder this further, your thoughts are pulled back to the present.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Anyway, no matter where you are, Commandant, Nanami will come rushing to find you!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Humming cheerfully, she flashes a peace sign and gives you a playful wink.'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'Congratulations, players! You\'ve achieved first place in the global leaderboard for "Cosmic Rider"! Please claim your rewards at the shop counter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yay!! Come on, Commandant, let's go to claim our treasure!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The "global" leaderboard meant to celebrate winners only displays two names: yours and Nanami\'s.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hey, what's going on?! Why are we the only ones on the leaderboard?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'Congratulations, players! You\'ve achieved first place in the global leaderboard for "Cosmic Rider"! Please claim your rewards at the shop counter.'}
{3: "The pre-programmed system cannot answer Nanami's question and is now repeating its default response instead."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "No, that's impossible! I'm sure people have played this game—it even went through beta testing!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'Congratulations, players! You\'ve achieved first place in the global leaderboard for "Cosmic Rider"! Please claim your rewards at the shop counter.'}
{3: "On the electronic screen, the barren leaderboard displays only a single, solitary entry at the very top—your name and Nanami's, with an ID code of 000000001."}
{3: 'The vast arcade echoes with nothing but the looping electronic voice and the endless drone of cicadas.'}
{3: 'Despite the world being filled with noise and life, you and Nanami are the only ones able to communicate with each other here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Where is everyone...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm sure we're getting more rewards than just this for winning first place... right?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=40>Chapter 1071</size></color>', 4: '50'}
{1: '2', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>— Midsummer Hide and Seek —</size></color>', 4: '-50'}
{3: 'Chapter 1071\\nMidsummer Hide and Seek'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieShizhong02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieShizhong02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'That strange sensation returns—a faint ringing in your ears, followed by an endless, deafening chorus of cicadas. Beside you, Nanami continues her relentless questioning.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm sure we're getting more rewards than just this for winning first place... right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: "The midsummer sun blazes overhead, and beneath its rays, Nanami's body begins to shimmer—becoming just a little more transparent than before."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: '...'}

{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience... While the mall is scheduled to be closed for the holiday, this system has issued a return-to-post command to all staff. Your patience is greatly appreciated...'}
{3: "After about 10 seconds, the mall's mechanoids begin to emerge one after another and surround you and Nanami."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: "Hello! This is the first time I've seen anyone clear Cosmic Rider!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid B', 3: 'Yes, and we have many, many more games here! Please try them all out!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid C', 3: 'The bonus prizes are this way—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh! Everyone's playing hide and seek with Nanami!", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}

{3: 'The street gradually comes alive—flying cars weave freely through the air, virtual windows float everywhere, and robots fill the sidewalks. The city now takes on the vibes of a high-tech metropolis.'}
{3: "The cicadas' song gradually drowns beneath the city's clamor. Having been attracted by the cheerful atmosphere, Nanami has run off somewhere and is no nowhere to be seen."}
{3: 'A pale-faced young man removes his top hat and offers you a slight bow.'}
{2: 'Hey, Seaweed Puffhead!', 3: '336', 4: 'Hello.', 5: '338'}
{3: 'The young man responds with a gentle smile, unfazed by the rather playful nickname.'}
{3: 'The young man returns a smile.'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: "What a beautiful world this is, wouldn't you say?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1014.jpg'}
{3: 'Golden sunlight, a boundlessly prosperous city, an advanced world of artificial intelligence...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{2: 'Perhaps.', 3: '349', 4: 'But what lies beneath?', 5: '350'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: 'Yes, this world is indeed beautiful, but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: 'You are quite perceptive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: 'Following a great catastrophe, the original inhabitants of this planet—the humans—faced extinction.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: 'There were no heroes in that catastrophe. They had no choice but to accept their extinction.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: "The machines, the humans' creations, managed to survive—though only a handful remained.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: 'We recreated <phonetic=Golden Age>the most glorious era</phonetic> of humanity. Yet such a futile endeavor cannot bring them back.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: 'You and the young lady known as Nanami are the most extraordinary beings our establishment has ever hosted. It is my honor to meet you both.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A warm, stuffy breeze drifts by as the young man glances at the gray-haired girl playing nearby, then turns his gaze back to you.'}
{2: '...Is there nothing else we can do about this?', 3: '361'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: 'No, unfortunately.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He answers the question with just two words.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: "That's not true.", 3: '55', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: "That's not true."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{3: 'A voice within your heart cries out, unbidden and inexplicable.'}
{3: 'Buried within those hazy memories lies a conclusion that contradicts everything.'}
{2: 'I seem to have experienced many different worlds.', 3: '375'}
{3: "If there's anything I can do..."}
{2: "Perhaps there exists an apocalypse that isn't as bleak as today's.", 3: '377'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: 'Mm, perhaps.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young man remains noncommittal.'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: "But... an apocalypse that isn't as bleak would probably come with an unimaginable burden.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: '...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seaweed Puffhead', 3: "It's just speculation. More importantly, the prize for clearing Cosmic Rider is a bit far from here. I hope you don't mind making the journey.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{3: "After leaving the game store, you stroll down the street with Nanami. She happily hugs her newfound treasure—the Cosmic Rider's Belt—close to her chest."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory609.jpg'}

{3: 'In this post-apocalyptic world, vegetation springs back to life and all things recover. The intelligent mechanoids have recreated a human civilization even more splendid than that from before the apocalypse.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{3: 'The city night is remarkably clear... Yet the interweaving neon lights fill the canvas of the sky with their dazzling radiance, leaving no room for starlight to peek through.'}
{3: "This prosperity... it doesn't belong to you..."}
{2: 'I wonder if those Cosmic Riders ever managed to save the world...', 3: '398'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami doesn't know either.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She answers softly. After a moment of contemplation, she bounces her way around to face you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey Commandant, you know what? You look so down now that even someone chewing on a bitter melon would look happier than you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She furrows her brows in an exaggerated imitation of your expression, then breaks into a cheerful laugh.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami doesn't know if they saved the world or not, but what I do know, though, is that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'We need to do something about that look on your face!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She cups your own cheeks and gently squishes them to form an exaggerated smile.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Somewhere out there, there must be a world where you can truly smile...', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'After all, I...', 3: '55', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0', 5: '0.5'}
{3: "Time seems to slow as her lips move ever so slightly, her words lost to the city's clamor."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'The dazzling neon lights blur together, and her figure slowly fades into nothing...'}
